NOTE: It's not necessary to download these files to use GeographicLib.

GeodTest.dat.gz and GeodTest-share.dat.gz provide test data for
geodesics.  See

 https://geographiclib.sourceforge.io/html/geodesic.html#testgeod

TMCoords.dat.gz provides test data for the transverse Mercator
projection.  See

 https://geographiclib.sourceforge.io/html/transversemercator.html#testmerc

GeoidHeights.dat.gz provides test data for geoid heights.  See

 https://geographiclib.sourceforge.io/html/geoid.html#testgeoid
